title: College Preparatory Communication Skills

vocab.definition: Formal style of communication used in scholarly settings
Clear, specific claim that guides entire academic essay
Facts, examples, or expert opinions supporting arguments
Level of language appropriate for academic and professional contexts
Process of having others evaluate and improve your work

teachingNotes: Focus on transition from high school to college-level expectations. Practice academic writing conventions.

sample.question: What is the formal style of communication used in scholarly settings?

truefalse.question: A thesis statement guides an entire academic essay.

multiplechoice.question: What is the process of having others evaluate your work?

fillintheblank.question: Language appropriate for academic contexts uses ________ register.

shortanswer.question: What types of evidence strengthen academic arguments?
